Package org.casbin.spring.boot.autoconfigure

Class CasbinAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.casbin.spring.boot.autoconfigure.CasbinAutoConfiguration
@Configuration @EnableConfigurationProperties({CasbinProperties.class,CasbinExceptionProperties.class,org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.jdbc.DataSourceProperties.class}) @AutoConfigureAfter(org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.jdbc.JdbcTemplateAutoConfiguration.class) @ConditionalOnExpression("${casbin.enable-casbin:true}") public class CasbinAutoConfiguration extends Object
Version:
V1.0
Author:
fangzhengjin
